title: BONUS: Hard Fork Live! Big Tech’s Arch Nemesis + Bot or Not?
description: Live from the South by Southwest festival in Austin, a conversation with the assistant attorney general Jonathan Kanter.

title: Amazon Plans to Lay Off Another 9,000 Employees
description: The cuts follow another round of layoffs affecting more than 18,000 jobs announced several months ago.

title: Book Review: ‘Meganets,’ by David B. Auerbach
description: Who’s really in charge of our online behavior? No one, David Auerbach argues in “Meganets.”

title: Falling Lithium Prices Are Making Electric Cars More Affordable
description: An unexpected decline in the price of an essential battery material, along with those of other commodities, is good news for buyers. But experts disagree on how long low prices will last.

title: Crypto Wants Its Shine Back
description: After a miserable year, cryptocurrency companies are looking for ways to rebrand products that many consumers no longer trust.
